name: Last Hunter Z
description:
Welcome to this zombies everywhere, walking dead overrunning crisis frontier!
Mystery X viruses has infected the whole world. People become zombies. As the last hunter, You've got to master all kinds of weapons, destroy those zombies, complete thrilling tasks and save the world before the last day!

GAME FEATURES
- Amazing graphics：Awesome experience of a Third Person Shooter game
- Massive main line tasks: 3 Maps, 60 tasks for conquer. Continuing update!
- Multiple game modes: Killing all mode, Map defending mode, Hostage protection mode, Seeking mode, Survival mode
- Versatile branch line tasks: Weapon trial task, Boss challenge, PVP
- Interesting enemies design: The looking and attacking features of zombies are different
- Classic ranged weapons to unlock: pistol,Submachine gun, sniper, flamethrower etc.
- Many melee weapons to unlock: metal knife, katana, club etc.
- Cruel Bosses: Many bosses standing in front of you. If you can kill them all, you will be a real warrior
- More features coming soon: Multiplayer battle, Skin system, robot system
